metadata.name: Draximage Maa 2 5 mg 1 Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Albumin aggregated is an ingredient in the DRAXIMAGE MAA kit for the preparation of technetium tc99m albumin aggregated injection which is indicated for the assessment of lung perfusion and for the evaluation of peritoneovenous LeVeen shunt patency L12816
